column1: Smoque BBQ////Maybe we went on a bad day
column2: but boy oh boy were we ever disappointed. Everything was dry... the cornbread
column5: the pork. The tea (something I consider a staple to BBQ) was absolutely terrible. The BBQ sauce was really runny
column7: basically vinegar. The meats both had a smoky flavor
column8: which was the only plus of this place. Overall
column9: a disgrace to the world of bbq!
